name: Survive The Night (itch) (Just Mr. Sir)
description:
A game where you must survive and fight an increasing horde of monsters each night. They turn passive during the day, giving you a break to rebuild your defenses. This game is endless, the end is up to you.

WASD to move; Q to open the pause menu; E to open inventory; Left click to pick up items; Right click to activate objects (i.e., doors, chests).

This is a game I made to expand my game making skills. Tried my hand at things like inventories, saving/loading, AI, and releasing a game. I will most likely no longer update the game beyond release.

Main Menu art and cover art not done by me. It's done by a cool dude named Bond made, with permission, for the game.
